form.preferredDefinition: The axial length of the eye and central corneal thickness is measured in this protocol using the Ultrasonic A scan/pachymeter DGH 4000B SBH IOL Computation module. (A-Scan pachymeter, Ultrasonic, Exton, PA) which requires direct contact with the cornea. Three measurements are taken on each eye for both axial length and central corneal thickness. Results of all measurements are then printed.

question.questionText: Contact Biometry Instrument Model (contact_biometry_instrument_model)
Axial Length (A Scan) (contact_biometry_axial_length)
Right Eye axial length reading measured, first measurement (right_eye_axial_length_1)
Right Eye axial length reading measured, second measurement (right_eye_axial_length_2)
Right Eye axial length reading measured, third measurement (right_eye_axial_length_3)
Left Eye axial length reading measured, first measurement (left_eye_axial_length_1)
Left Eye axial length reading measured, second measurement (left_eye_axial_length_2)
Left Eye axial length reading measured, third measurement (left_eye_axial_length_3)
Corneal Thickness (Pachymetry) (contact_biometry_corneal_thickness)
Right Eye corneal thickness reading measured, first measurement (right_eye_cornea_thickness_1)
Right Eye corneal thickness reading measured, second measurement (right_eye_cornea_thickness_2)
Right Eye corneal thickness reading measured, third measurement (right_eye_cornea_thickness_3)
Left Eye corneal thickness reading measured, first measurement (left_eye_cornea_thickness_1)
Left Eye corneal thickness reading measured, second measurement (left_eye_cornea_thickness_2)
Left Eye corneal thickness reading measured, third measurement (left_eye_cornea_thickness_3)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The axial length of the eye and central corneal thickness is measured in this protocol using the Ultrasonic A scan/pachymeter DGH 4000B SBH IOL Computation module. (A-Scan pachymeter, Ultrasonic, Exton, PA) which requires direct contact with the cornea. Three measurements are taken on each eye for both axial length and central corneal thickness. Results of all measurements are then printed.

form.preferredDefinition: An interviewer-administered questionnaire to assess if the participant has dry eye syndrome, which consists of questions related to the following symptoms: discomfort, grittiness, itchiness and watering.

question.questionText: In the last 12 months have you noticed any of the following eye problems? Discomfort? (eye_problem_discomfort)
Which eye? (symptom_eye_discomfort)
Duration of symptoms? Months: (symptom_duration_discomfort)
Is it still ongoing? (symptom_ongoing_discomfort)
Severity of symptoms? (symptom_severity_discomfort)
In the last 12 months have you noticed any of the following eye problems? Grittiness? (eye_problem_grittiness)
Which eye? (symptom_eye_grittiness)
Duration of symptoms? Months: (symptom_duration_grittiness)
Is it still ongoing? (symptom_ongoing_grittiness)
Severity of symptoms? (symptom_severity_grittiness)
In the last 12 months have you noticed any of the following eye problems? Itchiness? (eye_problem_itchiness)
Which eye? (symptom_eye_itchiness)
Duration of symptoms? Months: (symptom_duration_itchiness)
Is it still ongoing? (symptom_ongoing_itchiness)
Severity of symptoms? (symptom_severity_itchiness)
In the last 12 months have you noticed any of the following eye problems? Watering? (eye_problem_watering)
Which eye? (symptom_eye_watering)
Duration of symptoms? Months: (symptom_duration_watering)
Is it still ongoing? (symptom_ongoing_watering)
Severity of symptoms? (symptom_severity_watering)

protocol.preferredDefinition: An interviewer-administered questionnaire to assess if the participant has dry eye syndrome, which consists of questions related to the following symptoms: discomfort, grittiness, itchiness and watering.

form.longName: PhenX PX110401 - Eye Diseases And Treatment In Young Children
form.preferredDefinition: A series of 20 questions administered to parents to assess whether or not their child has/had any eye diseases and treatments. There are also questions addressing family history of eye disease.

module.longName: Eye Diseases and Treatment in Young Children
module.preferredDefinition: Eye Diseases and Treatment in Young Children

question.questionText: During the past 12 months have you noticed (name of child) frequently squinting? (frequently_squinting)
During the past 12 months has (name of child) had difficulty drawing or coloring? (difficulty_drawing_coloring)
During the past 12 months has (name of child) appeared to have difficulty seeing? (difficulty_seeing)
Does (name of child) close one eye when he/she is in bright sunlight? (close_one_eye_bright_light)
Does (name of child) close or cover one eye when he/she is concentrating? (close_one_eye_concentrating)

When was (name of child)'s last complete eye examination, one that included dilating of pupils where the doctor used bright lights to look in the back of his/her eyes? (This would have made the child temporarily sensitive to bright light.) (eye_examination_include_pupil_dilating)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child) had amblyopiathat is, poor vision that cannot be corrected with glasses or contact lenses? (amblyopia_ever)
Was that his/her...? (amblyopia_eye)
Has the child ever been treated in the past for amblyopiathat is, poor vision that cannot be corrected with glasses or contact lenses, or needing to wear an eye patch? (amblyopia_treatment_ever)
Do or did any of his/her relatives have amblyopiathat is, poor vision that cannot be corrected with glasses or contact lenses? (amblyopia_relative)
Do or did his/her mother have amblyopia? (amblyopia_mother)
Do or did his/her father have amblyopia? (amblyopia_father)
Do or did any of his/her sister have amblyopia? (amblyopia_sister)
Do or did any of his/her brother have amblyopia? (amblyopia_brother)
Do or did any of his/her grandparents have amblyopia? (amblyopia_grandparents)
Do or did any of his/her other relative have amblyopia? (amblyopia_other_relative)
Specify other relative. (amblyopia_other_relative_specify)
How many of his/her sisters have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_sisters)
How many of his/her sisters have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_sisters_coded)
How many of his/her brothers have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_brothers)
How many of his/her brothers have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_brothers_coded)
How many of his/her grandparents have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_grandparents)
How many of his/her grandparents have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_grandparents_coded)
How many of his/her other relatives have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_other_relatives)
How many of his/her other relatives have, had, or were suspected of having amblyopia? (amblyopia_number_other_relatives_coded)
Does (name of child) have strabismusthat is, one or both eyes are turned in, or turned out, or up or down, or crossed or wall eyes? (strabismus_ever)
Was that his/her...? (strabismus_eye)
Has (name of child) ever been treated for his/her strabismusthat is, if one or both eyes are turned in, or turned out, or up or down? (strabismus_treatment_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (strabismus_treatment_type)
Specify other treatment. (strabismus_other_treatment_specify)
Do or did any of his/her relatives have strabismusthat is if one or both eyes are turned in, or turned out, or up or down? (strabismus_relative)
Do or did his/her mother have strabismus? (strabismus_mother)
Do or did his/her father have strabismus? (strabismus_father)
Do or did any of his/her sister have strabismus? (strabismus_sister)
Do or did any of his/her brother have strabismus? (strabismus_brother)
Do or did any of his/her grandparents have strabismus? (strabismus_grandparents)
Do or did any of his/her other relative have strabismus? (strabismus_other_relative)
Specify other relative. (strabismus_other_relative_specify)
How many of his/her sisters have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_sisters)
How many of his/her sisters have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_sisters_coded)
How many of his/her brothers have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_brothers)
How many of his/her brothers have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_brothers_coded)
How many of his/her grandparents have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_grandparents)
How many of his/her grandparents have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_grandparents_coded)
How many of his/her other relatives have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_other_relatives)
How many of his/her other relatives have, had, or were suspected of having strabismus? (strabismus_number_other_relatives_coded)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child) has myopia (nearsightedness) or needs to wear glasses to see far away? (myopia_nearsightedness_ever)
Was that his/her...? (myopia_nearsightedness_eye)
Has (name of child) ever been treated for his/her myopia (nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_treatment_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (myopia_nearsightedness_treatment_type)
Specify other treatment. (myopia_nearsightedness_other_treatment_specify)
In the past 12 months, how many times has he/she seen an eye doctor for his/her myopia (nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_seeing_doctor_times)
In the past 12 months, how many times has he/she seen an eye doctor for his/her myopia (nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_seeing_doctor_times_coded)
Do or did any of his/her relative have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_relative)
Do or did his/her mother have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_mother)
Do or did his/her father have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_father)
Do or did any of his/her sister have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_sister)
Do or did any of his/her brother have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_brother)
Do or did any of his/her grandparents have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_grandparents)
Do or did any of his/her other relative have myopia (or nearsightedness)? (myopia_nearsightedness_other_relative)
Specify other relative: (myopia_nearsightedness_other_relative_specify)
How many of his/her sisters have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_sisters)
How many of his/her sisters have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_sisters_coded)
How many of his/her brothers have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_brothers)
How many of his/her brothers have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_brothers_coded)
How many of his/her grandparents have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_grandparents)
How many of his/her grandparents have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_grandparents_coded)
How many of his/her other relatives have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_other_relatives)
How many of his/her other relatives have, or had myopia or nearsightedness? (myopia_nearsightedness_number_other_relatives_coded)
Does your child have or has (he/she) had any other eye or vision problems? (other_eye_vision_problem)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? Specify: (other_eye_vision_problem_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (other_eye_vision_problem_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had cataract? (cataract_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (cataract_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (cataract_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had glaucoma? (glaucoma_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (glaucoma_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (glaucoma_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had retinopathy of prematurity? (retinopathy_prematurity_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (retinopathy_prematurity_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (retinopathy_prematurity_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had eye tumor/retinoblastoma? (eye_tumor_retinoblastoma_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (eye_tumor_retinoblastoma_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (eye_tumor_retinoblastoma_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had optic nerve hypoplasia? (optic_nerve_hypoplasia_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (optic_nerve_hypoplasia_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (optic_nerve_hypoplasia_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had nasolacrimal duct obstruction? (nasolacrimal_duct_obstruction_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (nasolacrimal_duct_obstruction_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (nasolacrimal_duct_obstruction_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had cortical visual impairment? (cortical_visual_impairment_ever)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (cortical_visual_impairment_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (cortical_visual_impairment_treatment_date)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child, for each child) ever had other? (other_told_by_doctor_ever)
Specify other: (other_told_by_doctor_specify)
What treatment did (name of child) receive? (other_told_by_doctor_treatment_type)
When did your child receive this treatment? (other_told_by_doctor_treatment_date)

protocol.longName: Eye Diseases and Treatment in Young Children
protocol.preferredDefinition: A series of 20 questions administered to parents to assess whether or not their child has/had any eye diseases and treatments. There are also questions addressing family history of eye disease.

form.preferredDefinition: A series of five questions to assess the participant's current use of drops for glaucoma, artificial tears or prescription medication for dry eyes, and steroid eye drops.

question.questionText: Is the participant currently taking drops for glaucoma? (currently_take_glaucoma_drops)
What is the name of the glaucoma drops you are using? (glaucoma_drops_name)
Specify other glaucoma drops you are using: (glaucoma_drops_name_specify)

For the past 3 months or longer, have you had dry eyes? (foreign body sensation with itching and burning, sandy feeling, NOT related to allergy) OD = right eye (oculus dexter) OS = left eye (oculus sinister) OU = both eyes (oculus uterque) (dry_eyes_past_3_months)
Do you currently use artificial tears or prescription medication for dry eyes regularly for 3 months or longer? (dry_eye_artificial_tears_prescription_medication)
Are you currently using steroid eye drops? (currently_use_steroid_eye_drops)

protocol.preferredDefinition: A series of five questions to assess the participant's current use of drops for glaucoma, artificial tears or prescription medication for dry eyes, and steroid eye drops.

form.preferredDefinition: A series of interviewer-administered questions to assess history of amblyopia and associated treatments including eye patching.

question.questionText: Was (name of child) born with any health problems (either physical or mental)? (child_health_problem_born)
Specify the health problem: (child_health_problem_born_specify)
During the past 12 months (if child less than 12 months, the child's age in months) has (name of child) appeared to have any difficulty seeing? (pxt110601_difficulty_seeing)
Has (name of child) ever been diagnosed with an eye problem? (eye_problem)
When was (name of child) first diagnosed as having an eye problem? Month: (eye_problem_month)
When was (name of child) first diagnosed as having an eye problem? Year: (eye_problem_year)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child) needs to wear glasses or contact lenses? (need_glasses_contact_lenses)
When did (name of child) first begin wearing glasses or contact lenses? Month: (need_glasses_contact_lenses_month)
When did (name of child) first begin wearing glasses or contact lenses? Year: (need_glasses_contact_lenses_year)
Has a doctor ever told you that (name of child) had amblyopia, that is, poor vision that cannot be corrected with glasses or contact lenses? (amblyopia)
When was (name of child) first diagnosed as having amblyopia? Month: (amblyopia_month)
When was (name of child) first diagnosed as having amblyopia? Year: (amblyopia_year)
Does (name of child) have strabismus that is crossed or wall eyes, where one or both eyes turn in or turn out or up or down? (strabismus)
When was (name of child) first diagnosed as having strabismus? Month: (strabismus_month)
When was (name of child) first diagnosed as having strabismus? Year: (strabismus_year)
Did (he/she) ever have an operation to straighten (his/her) eyes? (operation_straighten_eyes)
When did (name of child) first (?) have this type of operation? Month: (operation_straighten_eyes_month)
When did (name of child) first (?) have this type of operation? Year: (operation_straighten_eyes_year)
Did (he/she) ever have to wear an eye patch to improve his/her vision? (eye_patch)
When did (name of child) first start wearing an eye patch? Month: (eye_patch_month)
When did (name of child) first start wearing an eye patch? Year: (eye_patch_year)
In general, is your child's overall health: (child_overall_health)
At the present time, is your child's eyesight using both eyes: (child_eyesight_both_eyes)

protocol.preferredDefinition: A series of interviewer-administered questions to assess history of amblyopia and associated treatments including eye patching.

form.preferredDefinition: Intraocular pressure (IOP) is measured using the TONO-PEN XL instrument. The cornea is prepared by introducing one drop of anesthetic onto the surface of the eye and the TONO-PEN is used to obtain four valid IOP measurements. The instrument calculates an average and the examiner records the average. The instrument also provides the reliability level of the measurement. Only those readings that have a 5% variability level are recorded as they are considered to be accurate.

question.questionText: Intraocular Pressure TONOPEN Model: (intraocular_pressure_tonopen_model)
Right Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, first measurement (mm Hg) (right_eye_intraocular_pressure_1)
Right Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, second measurement (mm Hg) (right_eye_intraocular_pressure_2)
Right Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, third measurement (mm Hg) (right_eye_intraocular_pressure_3)
Right Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, fourth measurement (mm Hg) (right_eye_intraocular_pressure_4)
Right Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, first measurement (%) (right_eye_statistical_reliability_level1)
Right Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, second measurement (%) (right_eye_statistical_reliability_level2)
Right Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, third measurement (%) (right_eye_statistical_reliability_level3)
Right Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, fourth measurement (%) (right_eye_statistical_reliability_level4)
Left Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, first measurement (mm Hg) (left_eye_intraocular_pressure_1)
Left Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, second measurement (mm Hg) (left_eye_intraocular_pressure_2)
Left Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, third measurement (mm Hg) (left_eye_intraocular_pressure_3)
Left Eye Intraocular Pressure measured, fourth measurement (mm Hg) (left_eye_intraocular_pressure_4)
Left Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, first measurement (%) (left_eye_statistical_reliability_level1)
Left Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, second measurement (%) (left_eye_statistical_reliability_level2)
Left Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, third measurement (%) (left_eye_statistical_reliability_level3)
Left Eye Statistical Reliability Level measured, fourth measurement (%) (left_eye_statistical_reliability_level4)

protocol.preferredDefinition: Intraocular pressure (IOP) is measured using the TONO-PEN XL instrument. The cornea is prepared by introducing one drop of anesthetic onto the surface of the eye and the TONO-PEN is used to obtain four valid IOP measurements. The instrument calculates an average and the examiner records the average. The instrument also provides the reliability level of the measurement. Only those readings that have a 5% variability level are recorded as they are considered to be accurate.

form.longName: PhenX PX110801 - Ocular Exposure To Ultraviolet Light
form.preferredDefinition: The interviewer-administered questionnaire consists of three parts: (1) cities and exposure periods, (2) exposure periods during a typical work week, and (3) leisure/non-work period sunlight exposure. Answers are recorded on an answer sheet and UV-B exposure is calculated using a SAS program.

headerInstruction.text: Instructions to Interviewer: Start with PART I. Put all cities and exposure periods on one answer sheet. Use additional sheets, if necessary. Unless otherwise noted, all questions refer to the corresponding column on the answer sheet. When you..TRUNCATED

question.questionText: Explanation to the Participant/Interviewee: In this study we are studying how sunlight influences eye diseases. I would like to ask you some questions about how much sunlight you have been exposed to at different times in your adult life, particularly during the nonwinter months. To help you remember your exposure to sunlight at different times in your life, I will first ask you about where you have lived, starting with where you were living when you were 18 years old, and then about your activities in each of these places. I will also be asking you to estimate the number of hours you spent outside in direct sunlight. We want to concentrate on just the months of April through September and the peak sun times of 10 AM through 4 PM. You may choose not to answer some or all of my questions. The information we are asking for is important to the study. It will remain confidential like all other information that we have about you. (inst2_0110801)
A. In what city or town were you living when you were 18? (CITY/TOWN 1) (city_town_1)
A. To what city or town did you move to next CITY/TOWN 2? (city_town_2)
A. To what city or town did you move to next CITY/TOWN 3? (city_town_3)
B. What year did you move to the CITY/TOWN 1? (city_town_year_start_1)
C. What year did you move from CITY/TOWN 1? (city_town_year_end_1)
B. What year did you move to the CITY/TOWN 2? (city_town_year_start_2)
C. What year did you move from CITY/TOWN 2? (city_town_year_end_2)
B. What year did you move to the CITY/TOWN 3? (city_town_year_start_3)
C. What year did you move from CITY/TOWN 3? (city_town_year_end_3)
D. What was your main daytime activity or job when you turned 18 in CITY/TOWN 1? (daytime_job_activity_1)
D. [For subsequent daytime activities or jobs within a city/town...] What was your new daytime activity or job in CITY/TOWN 1? (daytime_job_activity_2)
D. [For subsequent cities/towns...] What was your main daytime activity or job when you first moved to CITY/TOWN 2? (daytime_job_activity_3)
D. [For subsequent daytime activities or jobs within a city/town...] What was your new daytime activity or job when you moved to CITY/TOWN 2? (daytime_job_activity_4)
D. [For subsequent cities/towns...] What was your main daytime activity or job when you first moved to CITY/TOWN 3? (daytime_job_activity_5)
D. [For subsequent daytime activities or jobs within a city/town...] What was your new daytime activity or job when you move to CITY/TOWN 3? (daytime_job_activity_6)
E. Period Year Start for the main activity in CITY/TOWN 1? (period_year_start_activity_1)
F. Period Year End for the main activity in CITY/TOWN 1? (period_year_end_activity_1)
E. Period Year Start for the new activity in CITY/TOWN 1? (period_year_start_activity_2)
F. Period Year End for the new activity in CITY/TOWN 1? (period_year_end_activity_2)
E. Period Year Start for the main activity in CITY/TOWN 2? (period_year_start_activity_3)
F. Period Year End for the main activity in CITY/TOWN 2? (period_year_end_activity_3)
E. Period Year Start for the new activity in CITY/TOWN 2? (period_year_start_activity_4)
F. Period Year End for the new activity in CITY/TOWN 2? (period_year_end_activity_4)
E. Period Year Start for the main activity in CITY/TOWN 3? (period_year_start_activity_5)
F. Period Year End for the main activity in CITY/TOWN 3? (period_year_end_activity_5)
E. Period Year Start for the new activity in CITY/TOWN 3? (period_year_start_activity_6)
F. Period Year End for the new activity in CITY/TOWN 3? (period_year_end_activity_6)

G. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] as a/an [MAIN ACTIVITY], how many hours each day during a typical 5day work week in April through September did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (workday_sunlight_exposure_hours_1)

G. When you were living in[ CITY/TOWN 1] as a/an [NEW ACTIVITY], how many hours each day during a typical 5day work week in April through September did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (workday_sunlight_exposure_hours_2)

G. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] as a/an [MAIN ACTIVITY], how many hours each day during a typical 5day work week in April through September did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (workday_sunlight_exposure_hours_3)

G. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] as a/an [NEW ACTIVITY], how many hours each day during a typical 5day work week in April through September did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (workday_sunlight_exposure_hours_4)

G. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] as a/an [MAIN ACTIVITY], how many hours each day during a typical 5day work week in April through September did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (workday_sunlight_exposure_hours_5)

G. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] as a/an [NEW ACTIVITY], how many hours each day during a typical 5day work week in April through September did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (workday_sunlight_exposure_hours_6)

H. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] ] did your main daytime activities during a typical work week have you on water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example working on a boat? (workday_over_water_3_plus_hours_1)

H. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] ] did your new daytime activities during a typical work week have you on water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example working on a boat? (workday_over_water_3_plus_hours_2)

H. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2 ] did your main daytime activities during a typical work week have you on water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example working on a boat? (workday_over_water_3_plus_hours_3)

H. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2 ] did your new daytime activities during a typical work week have you on water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example working on a boat? (workday_over_water_3_plus_hours_4)

H. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3 ] did your main daytime activities during a typical work week have you on water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example working on a boat? (workday_over_water_3_plus_hours_5)

H. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3 ] did your new daytime activities during a typical work week have you on water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example working on a boat? (workday_over_water_3_plus_hours_6)
I. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1 ] during your work time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim for [MAIN ACTIVITY]]? (workday_hat_with_brim_1)
I. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1 ] during your work time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_hat_with_brim_2)
I. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2 ] during your work time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim for [MAIN ACTIVITY]]? (workday_hat_with_brim_3)
I. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2 ] did During your work time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_hat_with_brim_4)
I. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3 ] during your work time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_hat_with_brim_5)
I. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3 ] during your work time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_hat_with_brim_6)

J. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] during your work time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_sun_glasses_1)

J. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] during your work time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_sun_glasses_2)

J. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] during your work time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_sun_glasses_3)

J. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] during your work time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight in [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_sun_glasses_4)

J. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] during your work time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_sun_glasses_5)

J. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] during your work time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_sun_glasses_6)

K. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_1)

K. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_2)

K. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_3)

K. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_4)

K. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 13 how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [MAIN ACTIVITY]? (workday_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_5)

K. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight for [NEW ACTIVITY]? (workday_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_6)

L. Now, I want you to think about a typical 2day workfree period when you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] as a/an [MAIN ACTIVITY]. During the months of April through September, how many hours each day of this leisure time did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (leisure_sunlight_exposure_hours_1)

L. Now, I want you to think about a typical 2day workfree period when you were living in [CITY/TOWN] 1 as a/an [NEW ACTIVITY]. During the months of April through September, how many hours each day of this leisure time did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (leisure_sunlight_exposure_hours_2)

L. Now, I want you to think about a typical 2day workfree period when you were living in [CITY/TOWN] 2 as a/an [MAIN ACTIVITY]. During the months of April through September, how many hours each day of this leisure time did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (leisure_sunlight_exposure_hours_3)

L Now, I want you to think about a typical 2day workfree period when you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] as a/an [NEW ACTIVITY]. During the months of April through September, how many hours each day of this leisure time did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (leisure_sunlight_exposure_hours_4)

L. Now, I want you to think about a typical 2day workfree period when you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] as a/an [MAIN ACTIVITY]. During the months of April through September, how many hours each day of this leisure time did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (leisure_sunlight_exposure_hours_5)

L. Now, I want you to think about a typical 2day workfree period when you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] as a/an [NEW ACTIVITY]. During the months of April through September, how many hours each day of this leisure time did you spend outside in direct sunlight between 10 AM and 4 PM? (leisure_sunlight_exposure_hours_6)

M. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] did your main daytime activities during your leisure time have you over water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example sailing, fishing or swimming? (leisure_over_water_3_plus_hours_1)

M. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] did your main daytime activities during your leisure time have you over water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example sailing, fishing or swimming? (leisure_over_water_3_plus_hours_2)

M. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] did your main daytime activities during your leisure time have you over water for a total of three or more hours a day, for example sailing, fishing or swimming? (leisure_over_water_3_plus_hours_3)
N. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] during your leisure time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim? (leisure_hat_with_brim_1)
N. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] during your leisure time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim? (leisure_hat_with_brim_2)
N. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] during your leisure time, when you were outside in direct sunlight, how often did you wear a hat with a brim? (leisure_hat_with_brim_3)

O. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] during your leisure time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight? (leisure_sun_glasses_1)

O. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] during your leisure time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight? (leisure_sun_glasses_2)

O. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] during your leisure time, about how often did you wear prescription or nonprescription sunglasses when you were outside in direct sunlight? (leisure_sun_glasses_3)
P. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 1] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight? (leisure_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_1)
P. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 2] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight? (leisure_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_2)
P. When you were living in [CITY/TOWN 3] how often did you wear ordinary glasses or contact lenses when you were outside in direct sunlight? (leisure_ordinary_glasses_contact_lenses_3)
Answer Sheet image (sunexp51_answersheet)

instruction.text: You can see the scoring procedure under the Scoring section here.

question.questionText: You can see the scoring procedure under the Scoring section "https://www.phenxtoolkit.org/index.php?pageLink=browse.protocoldetails&id=110801" here. (soring_0110801)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The interviewer-administered questionnaire consists of three parts: (1) cities and exposure periods, (2) exposure periods during a typical work week, and (3) leisure/non-work period sunlight exposure. Answers are recorded on an answer sheet and UV-B exposure is calculated using a SAS program.

form.longName: PhenX PX110901 - Personal And Family History Of Eye Disease And Treatment
form.preferredDefinition: Questions are asked to determine personal and family history of glaucoma, macular degeneration, cataract, and diabetic retinopathy. Questions are also asked to determine the participant's history of laser and/or eye surgery for cataract, glaucoma and diabetic retinopathy.

module.longName: Personal and Family History of Eye Disease and Treatments
module.preferredDefinition: Personal and Family History of Eye Disease and Treatments

question.questionText: At the present time, would you say your eyesight using both eyes (with glasses or contact lenses, if you wear them) is: (both_eyes_eyesight)
CATARACTRELATED QUESTIONS: (cataract_heading)
Has a doctor ever told you that you had cataracts in either eye? (pxt110901_cataract_ever)
Did you ever have cataract surgery? (cataract_surgery_ever)
We are only interested in blood relatives. (desc1_0110901)
Do or did any of your relatives have cataracts? (cataract_relative)
Do or did his/her mother have cataracts? (cataract_mother)
Do or did his/her father have cataracts? (cataract_father)
Do or did any of his/her sister have cataracts? (cataract_sister)
Do or did any of his/her brother have cataracts? (cataract_brother)
Do or did any of his/her daughter have cataracts? (cataract_daughter)
Do or did any of his/her son have cataracts? (cataract_son)
Do or did his/her maternal grandmother have cataracts? (cataract_maternal_grandmother)
Do or did his/her maternal grandfather have cataracts? (cataract_maternal_grandfather)
Do or did his/her paternal grandmother have cataracts? (cataract_paternal_grandmother)
Do or did his/her paternal grandfather have cataracts? (cataract_paternal_grandfather)
Do or did any of his/her mother's sister have cataracts? (cataract_mothers_sister)
Do or did any of his/her mother's brother have cataracts? (cataract_mothers_brother)
Do or did any of his/her father's sister have cataracts? (cataract_fathers_sister)
Do or did any of his/her father's brother have cataracts? (cataract_fathers_brother)
Do or did any of his/her other relative have cataracts? (cataract_other_relative)
How many of your sisters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_sisters)
How many of your sisters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_sisters_coded)
How many of your brothers have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_brothers)
How many of your brothers have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_brothers_coded)
How many of your daughters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_daughters)
How many of your daughters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_daughters_coded)
How many of your sons have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_sons)
How many of your sons have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_sons_coded)
How many of your mother's sisters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_mothers_sisters)
How many of your mother's sisters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_mothers_sisters_coded)
How many of your mother's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_mothers_brothers)
How many of your mother's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_mothers_brothers_coded)
How many of your father's sisters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_fathers_sisters)
How many of your father's sisters have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_fathers_sisters_coded)
How many of your father's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_fathers_brothers)
How many of your father's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having cataracts? (cataract_number_fathers_brothers_coded)
GLAUCOMARELATED QUESTIONS: (glaucoma_heading)
Has a doctor ever told you that you had glaucoma, that is, high pressure in the eyes, in either eye? (pxt110901_glaucoma_ever)
Have you ever been treated for your glaucoma? (glaucoma_treatment_ever)
In the past 12 months, how many times have you seen an eye doctor for your glaucoma? (glaucoma_doctor_visiting_times)
In the past 12 months, how many times have you seen an eye doctor for your glaucoma? (glaucoma_doctor_visiting_times_coded)
What treatment or treatments are you receiving or did you receive for your glaucoma: Eye drops? (glaucoma_treatment_eye_drop)
What treatment or treatments are you receiving or did you receive for your glaucoma: Laser? (glaucoma_treatment_laser)
What treatment or treatments are you receiving or did you receive for your glaucoma: Surgery? (glaucoma_treatment_surgery)
What treatment or treatments are you receiving or did you receive for your glaucoma: Other? (glaucoma_treatment_other)
Specify other treatment or treatments you are receiving or you received for your glaucoma: (glaucoma_treatment_other_specify)
Do or did any of your relatives have glaucoma? (glaucoma_relative)
Do or did his/her mother have glaucoma? (glaucoma_mother)
Do or did his/her father have glaucoma? (glaucoma_father)
Do or did any of his/her sister have glaucoma? (glaucoma_sister)
Do or did any of his/her brother have glaucoma? (glaucoma_brother)

Do or did any of his/her son have glaucoma? (glaucoma_son)

Do or did his/her paternal grandmother have glaucoma? (glaucoma_paternal_grandmother)

How many of your brothers have, had, or were suspected of having glaucoma? (glaucoma_number_brothers)

How many of your mother's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having glaucoma? (glaucoma_number_mothers_brothers)

How many of your father's sisters have, had, or were suspected of having glaucoma? (glaucoma_number_fathers_sisters)
How many of your father's sisters have, had, or were suspected of having glaucoma? (glaucoma_number_fathers_sisters_coded)
How many of your father's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having glaucoma? (glaucoma_number_fathers_brothers)
How many of your father's brothers have, had, or were suspected of having glaucoma? (glaucoma_number_fathers_brothers_coded)
MACULAR DEGENERATIONRELATED QUESTIONS: (macular_degeneration_heading)

Has a doctor ever told you that you had macular degenerationsometimes called hardening of the arteriesin the back of the eye, damage to the back part of your eye, the retina, or senile macular degeneration? (macular_degeneration_ever)
Do or did any of your relatives have macular degeneration? (macular_degeneration_relative)

DIABETIC RETINOPATHYRELATED QUESTIONS: (diabetic_retinopathy_heading)
Has a medical doctor ever told you that diabetes has affected blood vessels in your eyes or that you had diabetic retinopathy or diabetic eye disease? (diabetic_retinopathy_ever)
Did you ever have laser treatment or surgery for your diabetic eye disease? (diabetic_retinopathy_laser_surgery_ever)
How many different times have you had laser treatment or surgery for diabetic eye disease? (diabetic_retinopathy_laser_surgery_times)
How many different times have you had laser treatment or surgery for diabetic eye disease? (diabetic_retinopathy_laser_surgery_times_coded)

protocol.longName: Personal and Family History of Eye Disease and Treatments
protocol.preferredDefinition: Questions are asked to determine personal and family history of glaucoma, macular degeneration, cataract, and diabetic retinopathy. Questions are also asked to determine the participant's history of laser and/or eye surgery for cataract, glaucoma and diabetic retinopathy.

form.longName: PhenX PX111303 - Use Of Eye Glasses Adult
form.preferredDefinition: The interviewer asks the respondent if he/she wears glasses of any kind. If so, additional questions are asked regarding type of glasses, duration of use, ability to read newspaper print, and use of a magnifier. If respondent indicates he/she does not wear glasses, additional questions are only asked regarding ability to read newspaper print, and use of a magnifier.

question.questionText: Do you wear glasses of any kind? (wear_glasses)
Are they: (glasses_type)
How old were you when you first needed to wear glasses to see clearly in the distance? Years old: (distance_glasses_age)
How old were you when you first needed to wear glasses to see clearly in the distance? Years old: (distance_glasses_age_coded)
How old were you when you first needed reading glasses, bifocals or multifocals? Years old: (reading_glasses_age)
How old were you when you first needed reading glasses, bifocals or multifocals? Years old: (reading_glasses_age_coded)
How long have you had your current glasses? Age of glasses in years: (current_glasses_age)
How long have you had your current glasses? Age of glasses in years: (current_glasses_age_coded)
When did you last have the strength of your glasses checked? Number of years ago: (glasses_strength_checked_last_time)
When did you last have the strength of your glasses checked? Number of years ago: (glasses_strength_checked_last_time_coded)
Can you read the ordinary print in the newspaper reasonable well, with or without glasses? (newspaper_ordinary_print_read_well)
When were you last able to do this? Number of years ago: (ordinary_print_read_well_last_time)
When were you last able to do this? Number of years ago: (ordinary_print_read_well_last_time_coded)
Do you use a magnifier to read? (use_magnifier_read)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The interviewer asks the respondent if he/she wears glasses of any kind. If so, additional questions are asked regarding type of glasses, duration of use, ability to read newspaper print, and use of a magnifier. If respondent indicates he/she does not wear glasses, additional questions are only asked regarding ability to read newspaper print, and use of a magnifier.
